channel.title: Brandon Harvey, Los Angeles, CA

item.title: Brandon Harvey, Los Angeles, CA
item.description: bio I’m a technology builder and a team builder, specializing in immersive realtime technology, collaboration systems, and product R&D. I have a broad background as a hands-on people manager, a product manager, a full stack engineer and architect, and a software designer, which gives me the ability to bridge disciplines and create situations where people can do their best work. When smart people are doing their best work, good things will follow.
